slave-frontend.title: Web frontend
slave-frontend.description: Front end used to provide web access for internal services at the kvm.

slave-domain.title: Slave frontend domain
slave-domain.description: Unique domain name for this slave frontend.

instance-guid.title: Main Frontend Instance ID
instance-guid.description: Unique identifier of the frontend instance, like "SOFTINST-11031".

frontend-software-type.title: Frontend Software Type
frontend-software-type.description: Type of the frontend instance, like "frontend".

frontend-software-url.title: Frontend Software URL
frontend-software-url.description: Software Release URL of the frontend instance, like "http://example.com/path/to/software.cfg".

monitor-interface-url.title: Monitor Web Interface URL
monitor-interface-url.description: Give Url of HTML web interface that will be used to render this monitor instance.

http-session-lifetime.title: Web Session life time in s
http-session-lifetime.description: Web interface Session life time in seconds. Default 86400

http-refresh-interval.title: Web refresh interval in s
http-refresh-interval.description: Web interface refresh interval in s. Default 4s.

require-ssl.title: Enable REQUIRE SSL for repman database users
require-ssl.description: Enable secure connection between repman and mariadb databases. This option is an initial value, used only when creating database users.

database-amount.title: Amount of databases for cluster
database-amount.description: Database amount to deploy with this cluster. Minimal amount is 2 required to enable replication.

-sla-0-computer_guid.title: Prefered Master Computer Guid
-sla-0-computer_guid.description: Computer Guid for prefered Master database.

-sla-1-computer_guid.title: Slave 1 Computer Guid
-sla-1-computer_guid.description: Computer Guid for the first slave database.

-sla-2-computer_guid.title: Slave 2 Computer Guid
-sla-2-computer_guid.description: Computer Guid for the second slave database.

-sla-3-computer_guid.title: Slave 3 Computer Guid
-sla-3-computer_guid.description: Computer Guid for the third slave database.

-sla-4-computer_guid.title: Slave 4 Computer Guid
-sla-4-computer_guid.description: Computer Guid for the fourth slave database.

tags.title: Provisioning db tag list
tags.description: Provisioning db tags. Set one tag per line.

logical-backup-cron.title: Mysqldump backup cron definition.
logical-backup-cron.description: Logical backup cron expression represents a set of times, using cron format.

physical-backup-cron.title: Mariabackup cron definition
physical-backup-cron.description: Physical backup cron expression represents a set of times, using cron format.

proxy-memory.title: Proxy Memory usage in giga bytes
proxy-memory.description: Proxy Memory usage in giga bytes. Default: 1G

db-disk-iops.title: Database Rnd IO/s
db-disk-iops.description: Rnd IO/s in seconds for micro service VM (default 300).

db-memory.title: Database memory in M
db-memory.description: Memory in M for micro service VM (default 256)

db-memory-shared-pct.title: Percent memory list shared per buffer
db-memory-shared-pct.description: Percent memory shared per buffer. Default: ["threads:16", "innodb:60", "myisam:10", "aria:10", "rocksdb:1", "s3:1", "archive:1", "querycache:0"]

db-memory-threaded-pct.title: Percent memory allocted per threads
db-memory-threaded-pct.description: Percent memory allocted per threads. Default: ["tmp:70", "join:20", "sort:10"]

innodb-file-per-table.title: enable Innodb file per table
innodb-file-per-table.description: enable Innodb file per table. Possible value: 0=disabled, 1=enabled

use-ipv6.title: Mariadb server listen on IPv6
use-ipv6.description: Listen on IPv6 instead of IPv4.

autorejoin.title: Automatic rejoin a failed master db
autorejoin.description: Automatic rejoin a failed master (default: true).

autoseed.title: Automatic join a standalone node
autoseed.description: Automatic join a standalone mariadb node to the cluster.

failover-limit.title: Failover amount limit
failover-limit.description: Failover is canceld if already failover this number of time (0: unlimited) (default 5).

failover-falsepositive-heartbeat.title: Failover check slaves do not receive heartbeat
failover-falsepositive-heartbeat.description: Failover checks that slaves do not receive heartbeat (default true).

failover-falsepositive-heartbeat-timeout.title: Failover check slaves do not receive heartbeat timeout
failover-falsepositive-heartbeat-timeout.description: Failover checks that slaves do not receive heartbeat detection timeout  (default 3).

failover-falsepositive-ping-counter.title: Failover amount of ping failures
failover-falsepositive-ping-counter.description: Failover after this number of ping failures (interval 1s) (default 5).

failover-max-slave-delay.title: Failover election ignore slave with replication delay
failover-max-slave-delay.description: Election ignore slave with replication delay over this time in sec (default 30).

failover-readonly-state.title: Failover Switchover set slaves as read-only
failover-readonly-state.description: Failover Switchover set slaves as read-only (default true).

failover-restart-unsafe.title: Failover when cluster down if a slave is start first
failover-restart-unsafe.description: Failover when cluster down if a slave is start first.

failover-time-limit.title: Cancel failover if time in sec not passed after previous failover
failover-time-limit.description: Failover is canceled if timer in sec is not passed with previous failover (0: do not wait).

switchover-at-equal-gtid.title: Switchover only when slaves are fully in sync
switchover-at-equal-gtid.description: Switchover only when slaves are fully in sync.

switchover-slave-wait-catch.title: Switchover wait for slave to catch with replication
switchover-slave-wait-catch.description: Switchover wait for slave to catch with replication, not needed in GTID mode but enable to detect possible issues like witing on old master (default true).

switchover-wait-kill.title: Switchover wait ms before killing threads on demoted master
switchover-wait-kill.description: Switchover wait this many milliseconds before killing threads on demoted master (default 5000).

switchover-wait-trx.title: Cancel switchover after timeout seconds if can't aquire FTWRL
switchover-wait-trx.description: Switchover is cancel after this timeout in second if can't aquire FTWRL (default 10).

switchover-wait-write-query.title: Cancel switchover after timeout if a write query is running
switchover-wait-write-query.description: Switchover is canceled if a write query is running for this time (default 10).
